translations: 错觉的，幻影的（等于 illusional）

sentences.sentence: In one now-standard text, Faragher demonstrated the persistence of the "cult of true womanhood" and the illusionary quality of change on the westward journey.
sentences.translation: 在一篇如今已成为标准的文章中，法拉格展示了“对真正女性气质的崇拜”的坚持，以及大话西游中变化的虚幻性。

sentences.sentence: Illusionary or "parasocial" relationships with television characters or personalities can ease belongingness needs.
sentences.translation: 假想自己与电视角色有某种关系可以舒缓人们的归属感需求。

sentences.sentence: In summary, space and time are varying and illusionary phenomena.
sentences.translation: 综上所述，空间与时间是可变的、错觉的现象。
